name: Oatmeal Cookies with Dried Plums
author: Nikki Wilson
summary: A soft and chewy cookie with dried plums and a bit of a surprise, fresh basil.
ingredients: 1 pound dried plums, cut into small pieces
½ cup chopped fresh basil, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line baking sheets with parchment paper
Place sugars and butter in a large bowl
Beat with an electric mixer on low speed until combined
Add applesauce and eggs; mix well until blended, 2 to 3 minutes
Mix in oats, flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt
Drop dough onto the baking sheets using a tablespoon-sized cookie scoop, spacing cookies 2 inches apart
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are golden and just set, about 10 minutes
Let cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes before transferring to wire racks
